title: Digital Statements & Spending Charts

sections.title: Bank Statements
sections.content:
A statement is a document that shows all your transactions.

- **Bank Statement**: A record of your money (PDF or digital).
- **Download Statement**: To save the document to your phone.
- **Transaction History**: A list of all payments and transfers.
- **Opening Balance**: The money at the start of the month.
- **Closing Balance**: The money at the end of the month.

sections.title: Spending Categories & Charts
sections.content:
Modern apps show your spending in colorful charts.

- **Category**: A group of similar expenses (e.g., Food, Travel, Bills).
- **Chart / Graph**: A visual picture of your money (Pie chart, Bar graph).
- **Highest Expense**: The category where you spend the most money.
- **Budget**: A plan for your spending.

objectives: Read a basic bank statement (PDF or digital)
Understand simple charts and graphs in a banking app

keyTerms.definition: A printed or digital record of the money in a bank account.
A class or group of things that are similar.
A drawing that shows information in a simple way.
